Player History
Had first career hit on 9/8/1985, off Mike Mason (TEX)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/12/1985, off Floyd Bannister (TOR)...
Injured on 3/23/1986 with a Fractured Hip, out for 5-6 weeks...
Drove in 6 runs against Boston on 6/25/1986...
Drove in 6 runs against New York (G) on 7/13/1986...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1986, hitting .276 with 34 HR, 107 RBI...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against New York (Y) on 7/24/1987...
Drove in 8 runs against New York (G) on 7/27/1987...
2/2/1988: Gets a new one-year contract worth $4,028,571 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 8/21/1988 with a Inflamed Thigh Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Drove in 6 runs against New York (Y) on 9/4/1988...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/18/1988, hitting .381 with 4 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/1988, hitting .311 with 13 HR, 33 RBI...
2/2/1989: Gets a new one-year contract worth $4,028,571 through salary arbitration...
Drove in 6 runs against Detroit on 6/16/1989...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/19/1989, hitting .586 with 5 HR, 14 RBI...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Texas on 7/7/1989...
Injured on 10/10/1989 with a Torn Anterior Cruciate Ligament, out for full season...
2/2/1990: Gets a new one-year contract worth $5,292,857 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/1/1990, hitting .429 with 4 HR, 9 RBI...
Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
7/12/1990: Signed a contract extension with Oakland, $6,320,000 per year, for 5 years.
Drove in 6 runs against Seattle on 7/19/1990...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1990, hitting .359 with 8 HR, 30 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/11/1990, hitting .400 with 3 HR, 5 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/25/1990, hitting .545 with 1 HR, 8 RBI...
Had 22-game hitting streak snapped on 10/9/1990...
Won Most Valuable Player Award in 1990, hitting .321 with 40 HR, 143 RBI...
